## CharityStats interface

Data representing the internal values of a charity.

**Signature:**

```typescript
interface CharityStats 
```

|  [saves](./bitburner.charitystats.saves.md) |  | number | How many people die as a result of this charity |

|  [strength\_success\_weight](./bitburner.charitystats.strength_success_weight.md) |  | number | strength level impact on success change of the charity |
